\documentclass{standalone}

\input{tickz_setup.txt}

% Run once then run gnuplot on the .gnuplot generated file to generate a .table aux file that contains the function values 
% Run a second time to generate the plot

\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=2, samples=100, >=latex]
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\def\VoltageColor{blue!90!white}
\def\CurrentColor{red!90!white}
\def\PowerColor{green}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%\PlotGrid{-.1}{2}{-.2}{1.5}
\PlotAxes{-.2}{2.3}{-.2}{1.5}{$t [s]$}{$[V]$}

\draw (0,1) node[left ]{$V_s$};
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\draw[color=\VoltageColor, very thick] plot[id=u_chargeVsTime_RC, domain=0:2] function{1 - exp(-3*x)} node[above] {$u(t)$};
\draw[dotted] (0,1) -- (2,1);
\draw[dotted] (0,0) -- (0.3333,1);
\draw[dotted] (0.3333,0) node [below]{$\tau_s = R_sC$} -- (0.3333,1);
\draw[dotted] (0,0.6321) node [left]{$(1-e^{-1})V_s$} -- (0.3333,0.6321);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
